actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to amend the Constitution of the United States to guarantee the right of any State to apportion one house of its legislature on factors other than population.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Permits any State with a bicameral legislature to apportion one house of its legislature on factors other than population.

titles.title: Joint resolution to amend the Constitution of the United States to guarantee the right of any State to apportion one house of its legislature on factors other than population.
